attributes.action: Reconsider planned changes in History National Curriculm
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The plans to change the National Curriculm in History and remove the need to study (or)references to Churchill, Hiler and Stalin. These people were major influence on the 21st Century and the effect of their actions needs to be taught to all future generations. 

Omiting these charecters from 20th Century history would leave a false impression on the other political charteters, giving them more importance that they deserve.
